sentence.Network_en: In a transfusion, donor and recipient should be of the same blood group to prevent agglutination.

sentence.Network_en: By use of the agglutination test healthy carriers of the organisms have been identified.

means.word_mean: 1. a clumping of bacteria or red cells when held together by antibodies (agglutinins)
2. the building of words from component morphemes that retain their form and meaning in the process of combining
3. the coalescing of small particles that are suspended in solution; these larger masses are then (usually) precipitated
